section1.title: BK Sharing - Online Platform Connecting Mentors And Learners
section1.description: We provide a platform for mentors to share their knowledge and experience with learners who are eager to learn.

section2.description: BK Sharing is a cloud-based software that provides a comprehensive solution for mentors and learners to connect, communicate, and collaborate.

card2.title: Online Scheduling & Calendar
card2.description: Manage your schedule and appointments with ease. Set up meetings, classes, and events with just a few clicks

card3.title: Online Video Conferencing
card3.description: Connect with your mentors and learners through high-quality video conferencing. Share your screen, files, and more

section3.description: BK Sharing is a platform that allows educators to create online classes whereby they can store the course materials online and provide students with feedback all in one place.
